text:
Cold room, flickering candlelight, tension hangs thick.  
She reads, trembling with ecstasy.  
Sonia: “Four days dead… it’s impossible!”  
Sonia: “But if you believe…”  

---  

Sonia closes the book, breathless.  
Sonia: “That’s all about Lazarus.”  
Sonia: “I can’t look at you.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Sonia reads about the raising of Lazarus, deeply moved, while Raskolnikov grapples with his own turmoil and isolation.
